Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.routing.database

Class RouteManager

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.routing.database.RouteManager
public class RouteManager extends Object
Provides some helper methods which makes route handling easier.

    • getRoutesFromDatabaseForMessage

      public final Map<String,VehicleRoute> getRoutesFromDatabaseForMessage()
      This will return a list of all known routes which are stored in the database in a message friendly way.
      Returns:

    • createRouteForRTI

      public final VehicleRoute createRouteForRTI(Route route)
      Transforms a database Route into a VehicleRoute object which can be send to other ambassadors.
      Parameters:
      route - a Route loaded from the scenario database.
      Returns:
      simplified version of the route suitable to send to other ambassadors

    • createRouteByCandidateRoute

      public final Route createRouteByCandidateRoute(CandidateRoute candidateRoute) throws IllegalRouteException
      This creates a new route based on the given nodes.
      Parameters:
      candidateRoute - list of all nodes to look through
      Throws:
